#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t>0){
		int n,count=0,temp2,gcd,temp3;
		cin>>n;
		temp3=n;
		count++;
		for(int i=2;i<n;i++){
			if(n%i==0){
				continue;
			}
			temp2=i;
			gcd=n;
			while(temp2>0){
				temp3=temp2;
				temp2=gcd%temp2;
				gcd=temp3;
			}
			if(gcd==1){
				count++;
			}
		}
		cout<<count<<'\n';
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
